sourcesContent:
import { useAuth } from "../context/authContext" export const ShowUser=()=>{ const {logOut,currentUser}=useAuth(); const {firstName,lastName,gender,email,address:{city,state,country,pinCode},phone}=currentUser; return

{`${firstName} ${lastName}`}

Email:{email}

Gender:{gender}

Phone Number: {phone}

Address: {`${city},${state},${country}`}

Pin Code: {pinCode}

}
